message:
Hello guys,,
I'm facing problem while developing some models using Unity Script c# when i  create  Mesh "Cube" i got empty scene
After testing and debugging i knew it's about  protection level 
Setting the protection to Public and i got empty scene with no objects but variables are their and i can put values in them but i want to be dynamically 
It works if i set protection to protected and set initial values but i want to edit them during run time and reading some data using XML file 
any idea why i'm getting this issue or anything i can do to solve this issue 
would be appreciated
name: Photos from Ibrahem Salah's post

data.message:
انا مش عارف الكود الي انتا حاطه ف الصور كامل ولا لا بس لو هوا ده الكود فا طبيعي ما يعملش حاجة لاني الي فهمته انك مش منادي ع الفانكشن بتاعت ال setvariables  في ال start function لان دي  زي ال constructor  كده و تقريبا بتتنده كل frame على حسب مافاكر 
و الله اعلم :D
لا لا ده الكود مش كامل وفي 2 كلاس اصلا عاملها call
هوا عندي كود بنفس الطريقة و شغال،،
انا عاوز اعمل كذا اوبجكت وكل واحد ب position مختلف

You want to create a bunch of cubes in different positions?
Then create a prefab that contains that Cube with all other things you want to add to it (like a Box Collider maybe?), then write a MonoBehavior that takes an instance of that prefab and then just Instantiate clones of that prefab with whatever position you want.
If you don't know what prefabs are, watch this: http://unity3d.com/learn/tutorials/modules/beginner/editor/prefabs-concept-usage
No no not a prefab i need something more advanced like creating Mesh from scratch t o model a freehand drawn object

well then, in this case you'd need to create a MeshFilter manually and give it all the Vertex Data (position, normal, texcoord, etc.), you need to know a bit of low-level knowledge to do this.
I personally never did this before in Unity, but I did it in XNA/MonoGame.

I know it and i draw a MeshFilter and it's working but if i tried to create more than one it gives me errors 
i wanted to create a MeshFilter class and call it more than one time like objects you got my point ?

So are you trying to make more than one MeshRenderer reference the same MeshFilter, or more than one MeshFilter referencing the same Mesh?
BTW sorry for not being able to understand your question initially, the wording wasn't clear.

It's okay i couldn't express my problem duo to my primitive skill in Unity, I'm newbie to Unity 

I want to make more than MeshFilter but with different parameters 
i'm using Cube but each time i want to set different vertices

Why are you using a Cube when you need to see a different shape each time?
Try putting a MeshFilter on the game object but have the Mesh property set to null (press the circle thing and choose "none"), then in your Start method, do something like:
MeshFilter.mesh = new Mesh();
then set the veticies, uv, and triangle properties on that mesh.
Check this link: http://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/Mesh.html

Yup it's null 
i'm just giving you an example 
i will try this link thanks for being helpful :D
And BTW i want to create more than 1 Mesh in the same frame not to edit previous one

Then you need to have more than one game object, because you can't have more than one renderer on the same game object!
I'm always happy to help people make games :)

That's what i'm trying to get around i want to create it dynamically 
it was working using Prefab and gameObject and i'm sure there is something i can do to make it working using MeshFilter

yes, now you do:
filter.mesh = new Mesh();
then do as explain in the link I sent, also don't forget to set newObj.transform to something that you can see.
You could debug this as it is running by looking at all these new "Cube" game objects that will show up in the Scene :)

Yea yea ofcs i did 
I'm sorry i didn't paste all my code here  
And it's working but for 1 item 
It draws 1 item and nothing else 
I don't need to do transform  i set new position for each object

Do you mind have a private chat 
don't want to disrupt the group using more comments

well in order to draw more than one object, you need to make more than one game object that has its own MeshFilter and MeshRenderer, but you can probably have them share the same Mesh object.
Sure, try to send me a message, FB might not notify me, but I will receive it
